basic.name: Basic (Desi)
scenarios: My parents catch me talking to a person of the opposite gender. What is my explanation?
I accidentally send a screenshot of a chat to the person I was talking about. How do I recover?
The rishta (matchmaking) photo looks nothing like me. What caption do I use?
I'm at a wedding and the paneer finishes. What do I do?
Traffic police catch me without a license. What is my excuse?
I forget to touch an elder's feet. What curse do they mutter?
My mom finds the bill for the 'drinks' I had with friends. What did I actually buy?
I try to explain 'Netflix and Chill' to my Dad. What do I say it means?
An auto driver agrees to go by the meter on my ride. What's the catch?
I get added to a family WhatsApp group. What is the first message I see?
My maid takes a leave on the day of my house party. What is her reason?
I'm caught sleeping in the office post-lunch. What am I dreaming about?
A random uncle gives me unsolicited advice on the metro. What is it?
I wear ripped jeans in front of my Dadi. What does she offer me?
I order 'medium spicy' and it burns my tongue. What do I tell the waiter?
My friend says 'I'll pay you back tomorrow.' When do I actually get the money?
I walk into a glass door at a mall. How do I pretend it was intentional?
My neighbor asks for my Wi-Fi password. What do I give them?
I'm asked to sing at a family gathering. What song do I choose?
I find some cash in old jeans. What do I spend it on immediately?
responses: One plate Pani Puri, extra teekha.
Bas 2 minute mein pahunch raha hoon.
Engineering degree holder, working in sales.
Tu jaanta nahi mera baap kaun hai.
Putting a cover on the TV remote.
Saying 'On the way' while still in bed.
Using a plastic bag to store other bags.
Slapping the remote to make it work.
Only here for the free food.

edgier.name: Edgier (Spicy)
scenarios: I tell my parents I'm _____, but I'm actually _____ with someone.
My Mom thinks I'm _____, but I'm really _____ on the side.
I tell my Dad I'm _____, but I'm actually _____.
My arranged marriage rishta falls through because I'm _____ and _____.
My Dadi catches me _____, and I say it is for _____.
The reason my family thinks I'm still _____ is because I _____ them.
My boss doesn't know I'm actually _____ instead of _____.
The biggest lie I tell at family gatherings is I'm _____ and not _____.
My Instagram says I'm _____, but my browser history says I'm _____.
I survive marriage talks by pretending to be _____ and _____.
The thing I hide from my parents is that I'm _____ and _____.
My relatives think I'm still _____, but really I'm _____.
I lie on my resume about _____, now I have to _____ to keep the job.
The real reason I don't visit home often is because I'm _____ and _____.
My therapist says my mommy issues come from being _____ and _____.
responses: seeing someone my caste would never approve of
mentally checked out from this relationship
compromising my dreams for this family
one bad decision away from fame
a disaster in a designer outfit

superEdgy.name: Super Edgy (Go Bonkers)
superEdgy.description: No holds barred, absolutely wild humor
scenarios: My partner catches me _____, so I tell them _____.

If my friends knew I was into _____, they'd think I was _____.

responses: my therapist finding my second phone
sexually confused but making it work
watching things that horrify my parents
lying about my body count by several hundred
that thing I could never say at dinner
a complete maniac in the best way
my standards have left the building

regrets I'll take to my grave
way more than therapy can handle

millennial30s.description: Millennials in their 30s dealing with quarter-life chaos

responses: my Snapchat filters are a lie

responses: comparing myself to my younger self
